casebody.data:
No. 10-10041. Buford O'Neal Furrow, Jr., Petitioner v. Harley G. Lappin, Director, Federal Bureau of Prisons, et al. 564 U.S. 1008, 131 S. Ct. 2999,

180 L. Ed. 2d 829,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4427. June 13, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 393 Fed. Appx. 398.
